messages.title: £8bn a year extra for our NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to securing more funds for local schools and health services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Huppert campaign steps up a gear, The early pace-setter in this election

issues.health: £8bn a year extra for our NHS, Commitment to securing more funds for local schools and health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've been really heartened by the response on the doorstep and the fact people know what I care about - improving the lives of local residents.

quotes.text: Julian has been outstanding in supporting our campaign

images.caption: More & more people are backing Julian
Huppert campaign steps up a gear
The early pace-setter in this election

leaflet.additionalNotes: Julian and his team opened a new campaign office on Hills Road, hosting regular drop-in sessions for residents.
